OOC: I know it's been almost a month and a half since I last 
posted...but a new job and night school demanded too much of my 
time.  But school's out and I'm alowed to Play again...:) 

BIC: 

Ragnus awoke again from a long period of regeneration in his 
quarters. Those decades of rest in the volcano must have taken more 
of a toll on him than he originally thought. 

Before standing, he ran a self diagnostic check to ensure everything 
was okay.  Some small messages popped up on his retinal HUD. 

**Check complete** 
**32 Damaged pathways were located** 
**29 Were repaired** 
**3 others were too damaged therefore they were bypassed by new 
pathways** 
**Armor at 95%** 
**Weapon systems nominal** 
**Servos operational** 
**Running at 98% efficiency** 

That was the end of the list.  He realized that he should have done 
that scan when he first awoke.  He rose and started walking to the 
command center.  He had to find out what went on as he slept.
